name: Dungeon Odyssey
author: Son Min-woo
content: When the war between the aboveground and underground ended, humanity was joined by so-called &quotdungeon babies,&quot those gifted with supernatural abilities and an obsession with the labyrinths below ground. Despite being a dungeon baby, Kim Jinwoo suppressed his instincts, choosing to live an ordinary life as a guide and caring for his family. But when an expedition goes wrong and he somehow ends up becoming the new owner of a labyrinth, he discovers that he cannot ignore his instincts forev
